name: Fly Swatter V1 (For Wow Games Scratch Game Jam)
name_original: Fly Swatter V1 (For Wow Games Scratch Game Jam)
description:
This is for the Scratch Game Jam by Wow Games, this was made in only 4 hours and was my first game jam, I know I could have made it WAY better but I didn't feel like it at the time of making it and It was just for fun.

Fact: I already had made most of the game but in another game engine so I just remade the whole game in Scratch.

Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/scratch-game-jam2-wow-games
